short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Tab Manager, Session Organizer and Note Taking Workspace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension allow you to manage your open tabs and create lists of links to revisit.

You can see all your active Chrome Windows and Tabs on one page and manage them by:
- selecting and closing multiple tabs at once
- moving and organizing tabs to different windows
- searching your open tabs
- bulk pinning tabs
... and more! 

Create a list to drag and drop tabs into it, creating a repository of link lists that you can come back to and revisit.

Best of all, Tablist is private and takes your personal data seriously! We will never: 
- communicate with any external servers or third-party services unless you explicitly connect to our APIs. 
- track your browsing history, search queries, or any other information related to your use of this extension
- engage in any data collection practices that could compromise your privacy or security
You can read out full privacy  policy on: https://www.tablist.io/privacy
